short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces words relating to meat and dairy with more accurate descriptions - e.g. "Veal" becomes "Dead Baby Cow".

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AMDD is a silly chrome extension which replaces words relating to meat and dairy with more accurate descriptions - e.g. "Veal" becomes "Dead Baby Cow". May be enlightening for people who still like to eat dead animals :D Select hardcore mode if you want the unvarnished truth. (e.g. "Dead Cow Baby That Cried Out For His Mother")
